Class MainFrame

java.lang.Object
  explore3d.frames.MainFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
MainFrameInterface
public class MainFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements MainFrameInterface

creates displaywindow with frames,panels and controls on the frame the scene and panel is set. the panel contains controls. * @author J.J. Molenaar, J. Dooper
